p: The effect of extract of Z. armatum fruit (ZAF) and isolated alkaloids (ZAFA) was investigated for writhing response in mice and the results are presented in Table 3. It was found that both ZAF and ZAFA caused a dose-dependent inhibition on the writhing response in 10 min time. The pain was more significantly reduced by ZAF 300 mg/kg dose (40.99%, p > 0.05) and 100 mg/kg of ZAFA (45.91%, p > 0.001) and this result was similar to the standard drug Paracetamol (46.33%).
